response.original_title: EICTV Cuban Film School - Short Film Retrospective
response.overview: Short Films from Cuba’s International Film and TV School. THE DAMNED CIRCUMSTANCE / LA MALDITA CIRCUNSTANCIA (Eduardo Eimil, 2002) - TIDE / MAREA (Adam Breier, 2013) - FUCKING LIFE / PUCHA VIDA (Nazly López Díaz, 2007) - A PARADISE / UN PARAÍSO (Jayisha Patel, 2013) - THE ENEMY / EL ENEMIGO (Aldemar Matias, 2014)
response.title: EICTV Cuban Film School - Short Film Retrospective
